website_summaries.verdict: Satisfying and surefire way to remove wax and relieve itching.
pros: Stainless-steel set includes 6 tools to ease a variety of earwax buildup issues
Users love that some of the instruments have cleaning tools on both ends
With careful use, there's no way to damage ears
Most owners say they'll never use cotton swabs again
cons: Instruction manual could be more detailed

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: At first it's very alarming to stick something small and pointy in your ear and you have no idea what you're doing. But after a few days you start to understand how the tools really work. For folks like me, our ears produce too much ear wax and need to be cleaned out occasionally before a buildup occurs which affects the hearing. So this beats shoving a q-tip down your ear, using ear drops, or going to a ear specialist every day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I havent found a really good ear digger/cleaning tool in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I havent found a really good ear digger/cleaning tool in a long time. This has got to be my favorite! There are 6 pieces and they're double ended and it comes in such a nice compact case. That way I wont lose any of them. And even if I did lose one, I would still have 5 more. My favorite is the spiral one since it makes my ears feel real nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Daruny Yang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and well made
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly dealing with excess ear wax. Qtips and other methods just compacted it until i couldn't hear. These let me actually pull the wax out. Gotta be super careful with them but they work. Made of good solid steel too.
customer_reviews.author: Linuxian

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: When this set arrived, I thought how interesting. A six piece set of ear cleaning tools made of stainless steel in a hard box great for traveling...wow. The tools worked perfectly knowing you have to be careful when using them. They work extremely well. Recommended highly.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Korpi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you don't like the idea of using cotton swabs for ear cleaning, these are perfect! You need to be extra EXTRA cautious to avoid damaging the ear canal but if you have wax buildup these are pretty much what doctors use. Stainless steel makes it easy cleanup too.
customer_reviews.author: Why Not Mom

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first when using these ear picks since I have always used just q-tips. Q-tips are really not recommend so I wanted to try something different. I am very happy with this choice! It does clean your ears easier then I thought. You do need to be careful as you do shoving anything in your ear but I really think these do a much better job! If you are looking for another method I think theses picks are a great choice and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Morton

customer_reviews.title: Multiple piece set
customer_reviews.text: The first I used a product like this, I was in Japan and it was made of bamboo. When I saw this stainless steel set, I had to have. It works very well and I like the added feature on the opposite end. The bamboo one only had a feather. Not sure why but that is what it had. The is a great set of you prefer to remove ear wax in this fashion. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Meyer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This kit totally saved me a trip to the doctor! I had some earwax buildup I think from moving to a more dry and arid state. I made the rookie mistake of using cotton q-tips and I think I pushed the wax into my ear! I seriously couldn't hear for days. I remember leaning over the counter like an old man at the UPS store because I couldn't hear the guy! haha I tried every solution and even hot water with the rubber bulb but these tools did the trick! It's a little weird putting a long metal tool into your ear hole but it works. Just be really gentle and slow and you'll get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blake

customer_reviews.title: They work as far as I can tell
customer_reviews.text: I can gently go deeper without impacting anything . You have to go slow a first and be gentle but they work. clean under hot water and rub on clean dry towel. Some of the tools seem repetitive but they work.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Does it work?
customer_reviews.text: This may be a good product for someone who has medical training cleaning wax out of ears. That's not me. I was cautious about sticking some foreign object in my ear. The instructions are meager. I tried each of the different weapons. I didn't have any success. I would suggest reading the reviews and see what people did to make it work. It seems to me that it would be easier if you used these tools on someone else. You can't see anything when use use them on yourself.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: So, I have major ear problems and have to keep them cleaned on a regular basis. Meaning almost daily... These cleaners are a life saver and work awesome!! Just be very careful not to go to far or use pressure. If it hurts STOP
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, it RUSTS. Its not stainless steel aa advertised
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bravo!!
customer_reviews.text: Most handy little tools for those who can't use q-tips. Can be used again and again. Great price, great product!! 6 stars! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: Ouchies! It hurts to use.
customer_reviews.text: The product is made well with durable metal and I like that it has different ends on each one. However, it hurts to use! I’ve grown up using ear pickers bought at Korean markets. I remember those being smoother and not so hooked at the end. Anyway, I know I have quite a bit of build up in my ears and so far I haven’t been able to get much due to the pain. I mean, imagine scraping the inside of your ears with anything metal. Doesn’t sound too fun.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: unbelievably better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: unbelievably better than I thought. Better than qtips. Scared to use at first but there is nothing to them. So easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I didn’t need this many for my ears, just one will do, but I didn’t know until I used it. It’s so great for replacing ear swabs, to keep trash out of our waters and all!
customer_reviews.author: YellowBlueGreen

customer_reviews.title: Five stars but for the fact that it's not quite what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: Is the product good? Yes. The tools so far (a few months in now) still appear to be sturdy, quality metal that holds up to use and cleaning. My issue is the fact that most of the tips are identical, and this is advertised as a product with a whole slue of ear-cleaning options. There are six. Not twelve. And that's counting the little massaging ball. So I mean, great product. So it's a pity about the false advertising, or it'd be five stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: good quality tools
customer_reviews.text: my daughter (a NP)) used these on me, with a syringe filled with peroxide/water, and cleaned my ears out....tools worked perfectly..i washed them thoroughly before they were used...give them 5 stars..plan to buy another set for her to have
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty neat set of earwax removal kit. This is a great way to clean out your ears or even if you get it itch in your ear it'll do the job with scratching it. This is a lot safer than Q-tips because you do not half to worry about any fiber is being left in your ear. I would say be very careful when using it and I wouldn't never let a child use this alone. The tools are very well-made and you do not have to worry about them bending or breaking on you. Each tool has a purpose and they all have a nice handle which makes him very easy to grab.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hansom

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the case they come in. The picks are light-weight and easy to use. I have been having trouble hearing even with my hearing aids. I even made an appointment to have them checked. After using these tools, I cancelled the appointment! I tried the scoop one first, nothing. Then I tried the Qu-tip looking one, nothing. Then I tried the spiral one and turned it in my ear canal. I pulled out a huge honeycomb of hardened, dried wax! It was totally blocking my ear canal!
customer_reviews.author: Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, works well.
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for their intended purpose. There are enough different formed tips to find the one that works just right. Nice case to keep them all organized too.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Used comes with earwax
customer_reviews.text: Used and came with some ... a lot of earwax. Pretty gross if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These items work very well. Easy to use. Takes a couple of times using them to get use to the correct way they are meant to be used. With Q-tips you tend to push ear wax farther down the ear canal. These devices at like little scoops to remove any wax buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Hundley

customer_reviews.title: I only use the spring one in my ear when it itches and the others are great for little projects around the house or my crafts
customer_reviews.text: Interesting tools. Very handy. I only use the spring one in my ear when it itches and the others are great for little projects around the house or my crafts. Made of steal..love these.
customer_reviews.author: linda hendrickx

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little kit, seems to be well-made and totally reasonably priced. I personally feel that some of the tools are redundant, though they're intended to be different from each other enough to call it a 6 piece set. The instructions are decent enough to make it pretty clear how to use these tools. Wife says they're comfortable to hold and easy to use. Cleaning is simple, too, then dry and return to the included storage tin for safekeeping until the next time you need them. Overall, I would recommend this set for occasional use as needed and feel that the quality is better than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Darren and Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Q-tips work better
customer_reviews.text: This product scratches your ear. Seller kept contacting me to change review
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price meet up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: All ear products by this company are excellent quality for the price. I am a retired registered nurse and I am qualified in the use of these products. The tutorial information is helpful for non-professional people and with a little experience, you can feel confident that these products can help your assessment skills!! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kori Pilkington

customer_reviews.title: Can work if you're careful
customer_reviews.text: I used the various tools and implements in this case and it can get the job done if you're careful. The sizes and variations do help, but I would honestly recommend a flushing kit with an application of Debrox. This is definitely better than Q-tips though. Don't be too enthusiastic when using this, you definifely want to be careful as you can rupture your ear drum if too rough and reckless.
customer_reviews.author: Kage.Maru

customer_reviews.title: Frat for scratching an itch
customer_reviews.text: I have not put this in my inner ear as I am terrified I will damage something but the little coils tool is great for scratching an itch and I feel like it’s a little more sanitary than my finger. I haven’t pulled out any big chunks of ear cheese yet. As a lifetime devotee of Q-tips, I do feel like this is the healthier option. Maybe I’ll get brave enough to dig a little deeper soon.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Relieved my tinnitus
customer_reviews.text: I used Qtip shaped tool I this kit and felt immediate improvement in recent onset tinnitus (past month since shower water on pulse got into ear). Did not see any wax on the tool.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: Used with caution it eliminates a lot of earwax, I should know as I have a candle factory in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The diversity of the tools is exteremly useful, I purchased this a while ago and they are still in perfect shape. The metal of both the container and the tools are durable. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela thao

customer_reviews.title: Clean, nice case, solidly built - but need some instructions...
customer_reviews.text: Hmm... probably could use a little instruction sheet or list of the tools and their purpose. I’m a little scared to use these without more information. But they look super nice and clean. The case is nice. They’re definitely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeyville

customer_reviews.title: ... it for a few weeks now and it works great! It’s a bit different than using cotton swabs ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and it works great! It’s a bit different than using cotton swabs so there’s a learning curb, such as how deep to go in the ear. But it does get a lot of wax out and I don’t feel wasteful using cotton swabs every day!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Herron

customer_reviews.title: Case is a pain to open, the spring tool ...
customer_reviews.text: Case is a pain to open, the spring tool is very difficult to clean, and the others all effectively are the same thing with differently gripped handles. I found that the edges on a few of them are very jagged and would need sanding to avoid cutting the inside of your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Not as cool as expected
customer_reviews.text: Either I have really clean ears, I'm not sticking the tools in far enough, or these don't really do much... because I've removed hardly anything. My 3 year old loves rolling around in dirt though, so I'm able to put them to use on him to clean all the nooks and folds of the outer part of the ear.
customer_reviews.author: heather45

customer_reviews.title: Tools are fine.  The case is almost crap.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the tools themselves. I have nothing to say that over reviews haven't already said. But, in case it's important to someone, the holding case leaves a LOT to be desired. The tools do not fit properly in the slots, and the case itself is difficult to open, having insufficient surface area to grab the top and bottom edges. Bear in mind that this is a shape design flaw. The material quality of the outer case is great. The material of the inside holder is probably "felt"-covered cardboard, and it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: 5thRing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got this and was a bit scared but i jist had to try it and im so amazed on how effective this are, they got the job done,, I feel i can hear more clear now that i did see some wax come out and will never use Qtips again. Now i see that those just really push the wax back. This ear pics work amazing and feel and look so proffecional. Better than excellent
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but ear tickler tool is too bendy
customer_reviews.text: Good set. Has stainless steel handles. The coil ear tickler is a little too flexible and I have to straighten it out after use. Be careful when you use it as the steel is firm. Recommended for cleaning ear wax.
customer_reviews.author: A. Botnick

customer_reviews.title: Useful tools, don’t know why you need so many though.
customer_reviews.text: These are great but obviously be careful/gentle. You get a lot eat picks in this set but I don’t think there’s much advantage they all look/feel the same, I guess it’s useful if don’t clean/sanitize frequently do you can always have a clean one on hand but I clean them immediately after use. Would have appreciated s two piece for less money but with that being said the set is inexpensive for how many piece you get.
customer_reviews.author: DIYA AJITH

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on those silicone ones that do nothing as they are too soft and can't get into the ear very far. If you have wax deep in you ear and your hearing is being impacted, the silicone ones will do NOTHING for you. Get smooth metal ones with a variety of shapes and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: bcl

customer_reviews.title: Will help impacted ear wax
customer_reviews.text: I had impacted ear wax for over a week and couldn’t hear out of my left ear! These arrived Friday! Took me some time to clean the ear as I was worried of going in to deep. But place the tool in and you’ll hear fluid almost an move in slow circles and it will come out! I can hear ! These were a life saver ! And cheaper then going to get ear flushed !
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Grove

customer_reviews.title: What's wrong with sellers?!
customer_reviews.text: So, so cheap. May as well find a set without a case as this set was jammed into a foam cut case that they didn't even fit in properly.
customer_reviews.author: oldschoolninja

customer_reviews.title: What You'd Expect
customer_reviews.text: Quality was better than expected. Only ever use one or to - when needed. Items excess/options are nice to have and the storage is pleasant. Although opening can be a little tricky due to the indented lock - if that make sense. Otherwise okay product.
customer_reviews.author: TheCrazyAsian08

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah no, these don't work at all for self-use. Maybe if I had a partner who was willing to poke around in my ears they would be useful, but going in blind and poking around yourself is a no-go. Maybe my ears are super clean (which I doubt) but using these has never produced results.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I like ETEREAUTY products, very nice made and functional. I have got my daughter an ETEREAUTY facial brush and she like it a lot. I am so glad I found this useful ear pick set from ETEREAUTY. I can tell that ear picks which made with good stainless steel, are very nice designed and made when I took them out from the case. Each one of them is different from the other for a better ear cleaning experience.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Pepys

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for cleaning the wax out of my ears. You just need to be careful not to put them in too far as that could hurt your ears. Overall, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Edythe Sonder

customer_reviews.title: Quite useful
customer_reviews.text: You never really think you need ear cleaners until you actually start using them. I started using them a couple days every week and my ear hygiene has been beyond reproach ever since! There are different tools for different contours of the ear and do they do the job well!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: If you want to CAREFULLY clean out your ears, this is the best way, short of going to an ENT doctor. Just be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution...
customer_reviews.text: These are dangerous and can easily damage the skin inside your ear, not to mention you could damage your eardrum without much effort.
customer_reviews.author: *Sparkle*

customer_reviews.title: Should be called a 2-piece
customer_reviews.text: It has 6 tools, but 5 are the same with different grips. There are just 2 types of tools, not sure why you would need to switch grips unless it is just preference. It is also extremely hard to know where you're at in your ear, and seems very easy to go far too deep and cause an issue. Take a good look at the photos before you make the purchase - it's cheap, but you're not getting much.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Earwax cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I like the tools decent design, the only concerns me are the scoop size , I may have a smaller ears , one kit I adjusted the sides to make it slimmer. Thanks you I’m happy .
customer_reviews.author: Jofer

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bad helps especially when your ear is itching and you can’t scratch it The tools you have worked tremendously. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Helstong

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as normal q-tips. Both my husband an I tried them. May work if your ear was is a harder, more dried up consistency
customer_reviews.author: PaceFamilyRVA

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning ears.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a multitude of different methods to clean my ears. Cotton swabs can push wax further into the ear. These tools work extremely well, just don't push too hard.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Ear cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tool to remove was from ears. It got 6 different ones inside the box . All of them are so useful to clean ears. They are very easy to use and flexible to carry anywhere. On top of all its for very less price.
customer_reviews.author: Vijaya Bhaskar reddy Otikundala

customer_reviews.title: Convenient tool kit
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this was a good buy. I can properly clean my ears. Keep out of the reach of children though. The tools can be a hazard for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: almikaz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Great idea but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to avoid Q tips for environmental reasons. Tried to use this but it’s painful, hard to clean and generally not practical. Looks good but feels useless.
customer_reviews.author: David Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Good kit and happy
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my ears that is clogged with excessive wax, and now with these handy little tools, I can remove my wax completely and regularly. And this tool kit is put in a small box, so it is very portable, and you can enjoy picking anywhere in your travel. All the pickers are made in stainless steel and well polished to be smooth in your ears. I like this kit, and it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Zangwill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but too small
customer_reviews.text: These are interesting and seen to be high quality, they seem too small for my ears and pull back nothing at all from my ears. Wouldn't recommend sticking them in anybody's ears but your own
customer_reviews.author: Skonthebass

customer_reviews.title: Probably not good for your ears
customer_reviews.text: I've got a steady hand, but cleaning your own ears with these didn't work for me. well made .nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy/John

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Save the Q tips from those itchy ears! this works great and come in a great case
customer_reviews.author: Mekaha

customer_reviews.title: A little overkill, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: The picks worked pretty well at grabbing the earwax that was a little bit compacted. There are several picks that are basically the same thing. I am not sure why there is a need for 6 separate picks, unless you're buying for multiple people.
customer_reviews.author: Rob J

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought a singular one in Japan and I'm a little OCD when it comes to my ears. No regret getting this set and comes in a nice fancy case.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSaiyanFui

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying this because I had never really used an ear wax kit. However, this was one of the most easiest experiences I’ve ever had learning how to use an item. It is very easy to use and incredibly easy to clean. Would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jevin

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't bother
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy to hurt yourself with these. There are little drills that have a protector so you don't go too deep. I think I'll try those next on my quest for clean ears. For now I'll just stick with tissue paper.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. But I think the price can be lower.
customer_reviews.author: Yalin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable product. It is exactly what it pictured. The only thing I would recommend is not rounding out the edges of the ridged ends and keep them flat instead... though this might be a scraping hazard. Overall, it's a great little tool kit to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good for your kids excess wax
customer_reviews.text: They are fine but any interior wax will need a professional to get T
customer_reviews.author: WADE

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly & packaged well. So nice to be able to use these at home! Durable instruments & case! Very helpful! I would buy these again & recommend them to others!
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: quality product that is lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Well made, quality product that is lightweight and easy to use. Very pleased. A huge success when traveling with Doctors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for ear cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to clean. Not sure if I need every one of these in the kit since they are almost all the same. Not bad to have some backups.
customer_reviews.author: blee82

customer_reviews.title: These are great, they remove what the cotton swabs will push ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they remove what the cotton swabs will push down. I would use the cotton swab and nothing comes out and my ears would still be itching, so I would use this product and walla, there's stuff in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Mazie R

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So many options for cleaning your ears. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: EDC

customer_reviews.title: I can hear again!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man. I have not been able to hear put of my right ear for days. I get this kit, used a little mineral oil to soften the wax, and had my wife dig out some wax. After maybe three minutes of digging wax out she pulls the final piece and WHOOSH! I suddenly can hear. What a relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a mistake
customer_reviews.text: I received my order today and I was shocked to find out that I didn’t get what I ordered . This is a joke? I’m not happy at all . I do want my exact order . I didn’t order for an eye lash coating .. ridiculous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eladio E.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for problem earwax!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew that these kits existed. This has taken care of some major problems for me and more gentle and thorough than any cotton swab.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set. It takes some getting used to, knowing how deep to go but they work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the way these were. The tin however that they came in was bent due to shipping. But luckily enough I had a eyeglass case that I put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: These feel great in my ears and cleans my ears very well. There are no sharp edges on these so they dont poke you. They come in a nice case so you dont lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Titus b

customer_reviews.title: Good quality equipment
customer_reviews.text: Good quality equipment. Many different types of instruments here-- all seem well made and durable. Cleaned out a daughter's ear wax on both sides without causing too much discomfort or fear.
customer_reviews.author: CBZ

customer_reviews.title: Get the wax outta ya ears
customer_reviews.text: Use these and you'll have no excuse for not hearing people. Don't stick it too far in, and use gently.
customer_reviews.author: TamTomTimTikki

customer_reviews.title: and have come to like them as well
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my girlfriend, and have come to like them as well. They work very well and are comfortable to use,
customer_reviews.author: C. WalkerTop Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: Well made nice product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just like the ones my mom use to have when I was a kid except some of these have 2 ends that are different sizes which makes them even better.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Gantz

customer_reviews.title: Different...
customer_reviews.text: So trying a different approach to cleaning my ears with these. I dont really understand most of the tools and because I clean my ears daily with a q-tip I didnt get any wax out. That or I'm not going in deep enough because I'm scared to lol. These are ok but I think I feel more comfortable with a traditional qtip. They are made very nice, I just dont think they are for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: you will feel disgusted with yourself for living with filthy ears for so ...
customer_reviews.text: After using these, you will feel disgusted with yourself for living with filthy ears for so long. Definitely be careful when inserting though!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler S.

customer_reviews.title: Does What It’s Supposed To—Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I mean, for what it is. No problems or defects. Picks that ol’ wax just fine. The tin case is really good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: Ears are squeeky clean!
customer_reviews.text: Only down side is no suggestions for use of each item in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell W. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little set which gives you a lot of options
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little set which gives you a lot of options. However, the metal itself isn't the best quality and does not feel that great against your skin. I also think that the 'spoon' part of the curette is a little thick.
customer_reviews.author: AT Still

customer_reviews.title: My ears were plugged and I was desperate to clear ...
customer_reviews.text: My ears were plugged and I was desperate to clear them. I bought this based on the reviews but they look scary and really should be used by a professional. I did not use them and had to go to the doctor. But they look high quality and were very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: William Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Some pieces hurt my ears or is too big and ...
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces hurt my ears or is too big and pushed the earwax back further. I dont think I will use this product much. They were nice enough to refund my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I’m scared to use most of the options. It’s scary putting a metal pick in your ear!
customer_reviews.author: Bee75

customer_reviews.title: Money Back Guarantee BOGUS
customer_reviews.text: This product may work for others, but not for me. I bought it thinking the money back guarantee meant I would get my money back. Incorrect. Of the $9 they charge, they bill you back for $6 shipping and actually return $3. Not worth purchase if you think you might want to return.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Ear kit with box
customer_reviews.text: Great stocking stuffer. I haven’t used it but initial impression is that it is sturdy. Also comes with nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Molly C

customer_reviews.title: NIce Product
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pieces to get any ear job done. Great quality and nice storage case too..
customer_reviews.author: Florida gk

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Not sure that I need 6 of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Not sure that I need 6 of what seems to basically be the same thing, but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Reagan A Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning your kids ears.
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever needed to clean your own kids ears out then these are the tools for you. Along with a water irrigation system like that typical booger sucker bulb to squirt water in the ear safely.
customer_reviews.author: neokorros

customer_reviews.title: Came as described, solid tools.
customer_reviews.text: The tools (utensils?) are stainless steel and feel very solid in the hand. Works well to "scoop out" eat wax. Much better than q-tips (not that I'd EVER use q-tips to clean out my ears). Just got them, so not sure about durability, but definitely feeling confident so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rittenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Works great and super value!
customer_reviews.text: Received item today,I am sure that it will be fine,went to an ENT doctor who used a similar instrument to extract ear wax,worked great!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tom kaufman

customer_reviews.title: bad buy
customer_reviews.text: i don’t think this helps my clean my ears one way or another. it doesn’t really pick up anything. not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M. Wahla

product_meta.title: Ear Wax Removal Kit, 6-in-1 Ear Pick Tools Curette Cleaner Reusable Ear Cleaner, Medical Grade Stainless Steel Ear Wax Remover with Storage Box
feature_bullets: 👂 SIX TOOLS FOR CLEANER EARS: 6 differently sized curette cleaners to clean both soft and hard ear wax efficiently to give your ear canals a relaxing massage and proper cleaning.

👂 ERGONOMICALLY SHAPED STAINLESS STEEL EAR WAX CLEANER TOOL: all ear cleaners are made from durable rust resistant stainless steel and the anti-slip handle & special spring design give you a better control of the pressure to avoid damage and get a secure grip during use.
👂 ADVANCED GRINGDING TECHNIQUE: all surfaces of the ear wax removers are carefully polished and smooth enough to prevent scratches to your delicate ears to deliver pain-free ear cleaning experience.
👂 ALL STEEL CONSTRUCTION FOR EASY CLEANING: rinse the ear cleaning tools off thoroughly with soap and water before and after using. Then sterilize these ear pickers with rubbing alcohol.

👂 12-MONTH MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: if you have any problems with our spiral q tips / reusable ear wax removals, please contact us to get a 100% satisfied solution -- all ETEREAUTY ear picks come with a 12 month 100% refund or replacement guarantee. ORDER NOW with ZERO RISK!
